name: Scrambler
description:
Scrambler is a 2.5D action game realized by 3 programmers and 6 Game designers.
It has been made in 1 month in telecommuting because of COVID-19 and it was a great experience. The level I did is 5.

In this game, you play a virus that can possess his enemies and also part of the scene, your objective being to escape from a laboratory. You'll fight against different robots and each one is unique!
